segmentData.jobPerformer: Data analysts and business intelligence professionals
segmentData.jobToBeHired: Transform raw business data into actionable insights for strategic decision-making
segmentData.currentSituation: Monthly board meetings requiring comprehensive analytics reports
segmentData.desiredOutcome: Real-time dashboards that automatically surface key business metrics and anomalies
segmentData.unsuccessfulAttempts: Excel-based reporting that takes weeks to compile and is often outdated
segmentData.currentProcess: Manual data extraction from multiple systems, Excel manipulation, PowerPoint creation
segmentData.jobObstacles: Data silos, inconsistent metrics definitions, manual error-prone processes
segmentData.successMetrics: Reduce reporting time from weeks to hours, increase data accuracy to 99%+
segmentData.jobContext: Fast-growing companies need agile decision-making capabilities

competitiveAlternatives.whyCustomersChoose: Powerful visualization capabilities, market leader status
competitiveAlternatives.customerProof: Used by Fortune 500 companies like Netflix, Airbnb

competitiveAlternatives.whyCustomersChoose: Integration with Microsoft ecosystem, familiar interface
competitiveAlternatives.weaknessesOrGaps: Limited advanced analytics, performance issues with large datasets
competitiveAlternatives.customerProof: Preferred by Microsoft Office users, G2 reviews mention ease of use

competitiveAlternatives.whyCustomersChoose: Low cost, familiar to all business users
competitiveAlternatives.weaknessesOrGaps: Time-consuming to maintain, prone to errors, not real-time
competitiveAlternatives.customerProof: 90% of businesses still use Excel for reporting according to recent surveys

valueAndProof.timeToValue: Deploy insights in hours, not weeks
valueAndProof.collaboration: Real-time team collaboration on live dashboards

categoryData.categoryDescription: A new category that combines traditional BI with AI-powered insights and real-time collaboration
categoryData.marketNarrative: The future of business intelligence is intelligent, collaborative, and real-time

suggestions: Focus on the 'weekly reporting panic' pain point
Position against manual processes, not just other tools
